short.ar: أنهى أي دورة Udemy في أقل من ثانية
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Finish any Udemy course in less than a second
short.de: Schließen Sie jeden Udemy-Kurs in weniger als einer Sekunde ab
short.es: Termina cualquier curso de Udemy en menos de un segundo
short.fr: Terminez n'importe quel cours Udemy en moins d'une seconde
short.ja: 1秒未満で任意の Udemy コースを終了する
short.ru: Завершите любой курс Udemy менее чем за секунду

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Udemy Watcher is a browser extension designed to enhance the learning experience on Udemy by allowing users to efficiently manage their course viewing. This tool empowers users to mark all course videos as watched or unwatched with just a click, saving time and helping users keep track of their progress.

Features:

One-Click Video Management: Quickly mark all videos as watched or unwatched, facilitating a seamless course navigation experience.
User-Friendly Interface: The extension offers a clean and intuitive design, making it easy for users to navigate and use the available features.
Localization Support: The app is designed to support multiple languages, providing a tailored experience for a diverse user base.
Purpose: The primary goal of Udemy Watcher is to streamline the process of completing Udemy courses, making learning more efficient and enjoyable for users.

Target Audience: This extension is ideal for students, professionals, and lifelong learners who utilize Udemy for skill development and knowledge enhancement.
